item.title: 2XKO Moveset Design - Skarner
item.description: I won first place in the 2XKO community character design contest with my fan-made moveset concept based on the recently reworked Skarner.

item.title: Make Room
item.description: For the Ludum Dare 54 Game Jam, I designed and programmed a soft-body physics puzzle game in 72 Hours.

item.title: RushRushVR
item.description: For the final project of my VR Game Development course, I teamed up with several developers to create a small VR microgame collection.

item.title: BitBoxers
item.description: For my computer engineering capstone project, I worked with a team to create an arcade fighting game, but with a major twist - the combat was turn based.

item.title: OnlyGrabs
item.description: For my Game Prototyping course’s final project, I designed and developed a combat system for a fighting game where grabs are the only form of attacking.
